view.name: com.adobe.xmp.view.iptccore
view.label: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore_label=IPTC
view.description: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore_description=International Press Telecommunications Council Core schema properties

note.message: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/Introduction_note=All fields on this panel are from the IPTC Core standard(http://www.iptc.org/photometadata).

section.label: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Contact_label=IPTC Contact
section.description: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Contact_description=Use this section to record the photographer's contact information

property.name: dc:creator
property.label: $$$/xmp/dc/creator_iptc_label=Creator
property.description: $$$/xmp/dc/creator_iptc_description=Enter the name of the person that created this image
property.hint: $$$/metadataui/view/hint/comma_separated_array=Semicolons or commas can be used to separate multiple values

property.name: photoshop:AuthorsPosition
property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/AuthorsPosition_iptc_label=Creator^}s Job Title
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/AuthorsPosition_iptc_description=Enter the Job Title of the person listed in the Creator field

section.label: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Image_label=IPTC Image
section.description: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Image_description=Use this section for formal descriptive information about the image

property.name: photoshop:DateCreated
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/DateCreated_iptc_description=Enter the Date the image was taken

property.name: Iptc4xmpCore:Scene
property.hint: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/custom/Scene_hint=Scene values are defined at http://www.newscodes.org, multiple values may be separated by a comma or semicolon

property.name: photoshop:City
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/City_iptc_description=Enter the name of the City pictured in this image

property.name: photoshop:State
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/State_iptc_description=Enter the name of the Province or State pictured in this image

property.name: photoshop:Country
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Country_iptc_description=Enter the name of the Country pictured in this image

property.name: Iptc4xmpCore:CountryCode
property.hint: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/custom/CountryCode_hint=The location above could either be the location shown in the image or the location from which the photo was taken. To make a clear distinction use the two Location properties on the IPTC Ext panel

section.label: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Content_label=IPTC Content
section.description: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Content_description=Use this section to describe the visual content of the image

property.name: photoshop:Headline
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Headline_iptc_description=Enter a brief publishable synopsis or summary of the contents of this image

property.name: dc:description
property.description: $$$/xmp/dc/description_iptc_description=Enter a ^[caption^] describing the who, what, and why of what is happening in this image, this might include names of people, and/or their role in the action that is taking place

property.name: dc:subject
property.label: $$$/xmp/dc/subject_iptc_label=Keywords
property.description: $$$/xmp/dc/subject_iptc_description=Enter any number of keywords, terms or phrases used to express the subject matter in this image
property.hint: $$$/metadataui/view/hint/comma_separated_array=Semicolons or commas can be used to separate multiple values

property.name: Iptc4xmpCore:SubjectCode
property.hint: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/custom/SubjectCode_hint=Subject Codes are defined at http://www.newscodes.org, semicolons or commas can be used to separate multiple values

property.name: photoshop:CaptionWriter
property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/custom/CaptionWriter_label=Description Writer
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/CaptionWriter_iptc_description=Enter the name of the person involved in writing, editing or correcting the description of this image

section.label: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Status_label=IPTC Status
section.description: $$$/metadataui/view/iptccore/section/Status_description=Use this section to record workflow and copyright information

property.name: dc:title
property.description: $$$/xmp/dc/title_iptc_description=Enter a short verbal and human readable name for this image, this may be the file name.

property.name: photoshop:TransmissionReference
property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/TransmissionReference_iptc_label=Job Identifier
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/TransmissionReference_iptc_description=Enter a number or identifier needed for workflow control or tracking

property.name: photoshop:Instructions
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/TransmissionReference_iptc_description=Enter a number or identifier needed for workflow control or tracking

property.name: photoshop:Credit
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Credit_iptc_description=Enter who should be Credited when this image is published

property.name: photoshop:Source
property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Source_iptc_description=Enter the original owner of the copyright of this image

property.name: dc:rights
property.description: $$$/xmp/dc/rights_iptc_description=Enter a Notice on the current owner of the Copyright for this image, such as #{copy}2008 Jane Doe

property.name: xmpRights:UsageTerms
property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/UsageTerms_iptc_description=Enter instructions on how this image can legally be used
